}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *This is a 4-bay NAS. :It would appear to have two USB 3.0 ports and one USB 2.0 port.
*"BD141L2 08-06BD14114 V1.4" is silkscreened on the board :shown in the ''Akihabara News'' review linked below.
*CPU: [[Freescale#Network Processors|Freescale]] P1022 @1GHz Dual Core {{See also|List of NAS Devices}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/31939-synology-ds413-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (11/2012) *[http://www.pcadvisor.co.uk/reviews/storage/3425455/synology-diskstation-ds413-review/ On '''PC Advisor''' (UK)] *[http://en.akihabaranews.com/120994/review/review-synology-ds413 On '''Akihabara News''' (in EN, @ JP)] (~11/2012) :also [http://web.archive.org/web/20130404085532/http://en.akihabaranews.com/120994/review/review-synology-ds413 via archive.org] (working picture gallery) :Removable SODIMM for RAM Memory :(''ADATA'' AD3S1333B1G9-BM1G <?>)
===Other=== *[http://ark.intel.com/products/34395/Intel-82801JR-IO-Controller '''Intel ARK''' page for the 82801JR I/O Controller]
==See also== ===Possible used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the ''Akihabara News'' review :is a '''PGB''' EA11001E-120.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = PGB |model = EA11001E-120 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=2.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=unknown |output_v=12 |output_a=8.33 |output_c=DC |output_conn=4-pin DIN |style=modular, brick |countrymanuf = China }}
